com.guardtime.ksi.unisignature.inmemory

Class InMemoryKsiSignatureFactory

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.guardtime.ksi.unisignature.inmemory.InMemoryKsiSignatureFactory
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    KSISignatureFactory

    public final class InMemoryKsiSignatureFactory
extends Object
implements KSISignatureFactory
    In memory implementation of the KSISignatureFactory interface.

        calendarChain - calendar hash chain element. not null.

      • createSignature

        public KSISignature createSignature(KSISignature signature,
                                    AggregationHashChain aggregationHashChain,
                                    DataHash originalInputHash)
                             throws KSIException
        Description copied from interface: KSISignatureFactory
        Creates a signature by prepending lower aggregation hash chain to a signature.
        Specified by:
        createSignature in interface KSISignatureFactory
        Parameters:
        signature - instance of KSISignature to be prepended, not null
        aggregationHashChain - instance of lower AggregationHashChain to prepend, not null
        originalInputHash - original input hash. It is used to verify signature if it is present.
        Returns:
        instance of KSISignature
        Throws:
        KSIException - when error occurs (e.g input data is invalid)
